name: Acid Splash
description:
Replace INPUT with spellcasting ability.

This spell’s damage increases by 1d6 when you reach 5th level (2d6), 11th level (3d6), and 17th level (4d6).

Remember to edit the damage dice according to level.
macrocode: Acid Splash => DC [r: 8 + INPUT + Proficiency] Dexterity Save or take => [t: 1d6] 🔥 damage.

name: Battleaxe (one-handed)
description: A strength-based weapon used with an attack action.
macrocode: Battleaxe Damage => [t: 1d8 + Strength] 🔪 damage.
macrocodecrit: Battleaxe Crit Damage => [t: 2d8 + Strength] 🔪 damage!

name: Booming Blade Extra Damage
description:
This spell’s damage increases by 1d8 when you reach 11th level (2d8), and 17th level (3d8).

Remember to edit the damage dice according to level.
macrocode: Booming Blade Extra Damage => [t: 1d8] 💥 damage.
macrocodecrit: Booming Blade Extra Crit Damage => [t: 2d8] 💥 damage!

name: Booming Blade Movement Damage
description:
This spell’s damage increases by 1d8 when you reach 5th level (2d8), 11th level (3d8), and 17th level (4d8).

Remember to edit the damage dice according to level.
macrocode: Booming Blade Movement Damage => [t: 1d8] 💥 damage.
macrocodecrit: Booming Blade Movement Crit Damage => [t: 2d8] 💥 damage!

name: Chill Touch
description:
A spell used with a spell attack action.

This spell’s damage increases by 1d8 when you reach 5th level (2d8), 11th level (3d8), and 17th level (4d8).

Remember to edit the damage dice according to level.
macrocode: Chill Touch Damage => [t: 1d8] 💀 damage + can't regain hitpoints until the start of your next turn (undead targets receive disadvantage on attack rolls until the end of your next turn).
macrocodecrit: Chill Touch Crit Damage => [t: 2d8] 💀 damage + can't regain hitpoints until the start of your next turn (undead targets receive disadvantage on attack rolls until the end of your next turn)!
